snippet.title: LIGHTFIELD Official Launch Trailer - PS4 and Xbox One
snippet.description:
LIGHTFIELD is out now for PS4 and Xbox One! – 10% launch discount

Get on board this hyper futuristic racing game with a parkour twist. Drive on any surface including walls, tunnels and sci-fi architecture to piece together the fastest racing line. Compete in three single player modes as well as both online and local multiplayer.

Soundtrack by Zanshin, available to download and coming to Vinyl. https://minimumrecords.net



FIND OUT MORE
Website: http://lightfieldgame.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayInTheGarden
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LightfieldGame

STORE LINKS
PS4 store: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-gb/games/lightfield/cid=EP2292-CUSA07628_00-0000000000000001
Xbox One store: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/LIGHTFIELD/BRPGHH01G5PV
